candidates.name: Sarah Walters
candidates.why_elect: With a background that is both rural and urban, I will seek to build relationships to break down barriers and improve outcomes for everyone. I also offer a proven track record of previous local government experience. I am impartial, focused and committed.
candidates.why_stand: I was motivated to stand for Selwyn District Council in 2007 because I wanted to create a better world for our children. Even now, following a three year break after three terms as a councillor that motivation is still strong.

candidates.name: Allen Lim
candidates.why_elect: I understand the tensions of water management from many perspectives: as someone with children swimming in local rivers, a keen tramper, a vegetable grower, degree qualified engineer, businessman, and someone who has been in the water management space long enough to be asked to advice ministers.
candidates.why_stand: I have been concerned about the state of our waterways for a long time as shown by my 5+ years of work in the Selwyn Waihora Zone Committee and industry groups. I have the skills and determination to now move my work to the regional level.

candidates.name: Ian Mackenzie
candidates.why_elect: I have considerable experience in governance over a broad spectrum of commercial and community organisations. I have also worked in the water and environment areas at local, regional and national level and understand the science and public expectations. I can bring balance and sense to debate and decision making.
candidates.why_stand: My community asked me to stand as they trust my experience, skills and competence especially in the areas of water, the environment and transport. Our family have lived in the Canterbury region since the early 1840's and I hope my children and grandchildren will continue to do so.

candidates.name: John Sunckell
candidates.why_elect: I have lived in the community all my life and have a broad range of community involvement and leadership, particularly in farming, health and environmental management.
candidates.why_stand: Having done one term I am just getting to the point of understanding how to be genuinely effective as a Councillor and I am now in a position to face the challenges that are coming at us in the next few years.
